summary: Comprehensive testing of RUNETIC E-Commerce iteration 10 features: Access page differentiation (Mayorista/Admin), Login WhatsApp banners, Admin Dashboard modules (6 without Ganancias), Home page institutional sections, Checkout COD and Transfer flows with token generation.
seed_data_creation: Test orders created for COD and Bank Transfer flows
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working: 1) Access page /access shows Mayorista and Admin options, 2) Login /login/mayorista has WhatsApp banner, 3) Login /login/admin does NOT have WhatsApp banner, 4) Admin Dashboard shows 6 modules (no Ganancias), 5) Home page has all 4 institutional sections (Nuestro Propósito, Compromiso Calidad, Canales Venta, Nuestros Clientes), 6) COD checkout generates token COD-XXXXXXXX format, 7) PaymentResult COD shows WhatsApp button to send token, 8) PaymentResult Transfer shows bank details.

access_page_differentiation.details: /access shows 2 cards: Mayorista (green) and Administrador (blue) with appropriate descriptions and links to /login/mayorista and /login/admin

login_mayorista_whatsapp_banner.details: /login/mayorista shows green WhatsApp banner with text 'Si quieres ser parte de nuestra comunidad mayorista escribir al WhatsApp' and 'Escribir al WhatsApp' button linking to wa.me

login_admin_no_whatsapp_banner.details: /login/admin does NOT show WhatsApp banner - only displays login form with 'Acceso Admin' title

admin_dashboard_6_modules.details: Admin Dashboard shows exactly 6 modules: Gestión de Productos, Gestión de Pagos, Pedidos, Inventario, Descuentos, Entrada y Rentabilidad. NO 'Ganancias' module present.

checkout_cod_flow.details: COD orders generate pickup_token in format COD-XXXXXXXX (8 alphanumeric characters). Token is stored in order and returned in API response.

checkout_transfer_flow.details: Bank transfer orders do NOT generate pickup token (null). Order stored correctly with payment_method='bank_transfer'.

payment_result_cod_whatsapp.details: PaymentResult COD shows: 1) '¡PEDIDO CONFIRMADO!' title, 2) 'TU CÓDIGO DE ENTREGA' section with token, 3) Warning 'SIN ESTE CÓDIGO NO SE ENTREGARÁ EL PRODUCTO', 4) WhatsApp button 'Enviar código a mi WhatsApp' with customer phone number

payment_result_transfer_bank_details.details: PaymentResult Transfer shows: 1) 'TRANSFERENCIA PENDIENTE' title, 2) 'DATOS BANCARIOS RUNETIC' section with Bancolombia, Ahorros, account number, RUNETIC S.A.S, NIT, 3) WhatsApp instruction to send comprobante

backend_api_tests.TestCashOnDeliveryFlow::test_create_cod_: PASS - Order created with pickup_token COD-XXXXXXXX format

ui_tests.access_page_options: PASS - Both Mayorista and Admin cards visible with correct styling
ui_tests.login_mayorista_whatsapp_banner: PASS - Green WhatsApp banner and button visible
ui_tests.login_admin_no_banner: PASS - No WhatsApp banner, only login form
ui_tests.payment_result_cod: PASS - Token display with WhatsApp button

notes: PSE and Tarjeta payments still have external Railway backend issues (INPUT_VALIDATION_ERROR) as reported previously. Transferencia and Contra Entrega are 100% functional.
